name: Bunny Count
description:
Bunny Count is a First Person Stuffed Animal Doll Shooter
featuring classic game types in a cartoony , story book type setting.
Capture The Flag , Team Deathmatch and Kill Confirmed are included as online and offline game modes!
Its the Bunnies VS The Bears !
Who are you gonna be?
Works great for Local Area Networks and Parties!
See you on the Bunnyfield!!!!

This game is being produced, developed by a Solo Developer ,
Indie Game Studio Crypto Sports Games .
